Sideways stood outside the base as crosswise and rook whistled a conversation 
amongst themselves... "This could proove harder then i thought... i never 
suspected one of my old pupils to be here... but why can she not remember me... 
perhaps a alternate reality, or she is another... Heh why should i worry, my 
ship still works, and i'm here to deliver a message... then i go home."

--part1_2f.3a4e1225.2c0c3ae6_boundary
